name: Bee the Hero
description:
Made in 3 hours by Landragow and Bellatrion for Trijam #158

Theme: Force of Nature

Chaos is spreading, and nature is in danger.

To protect it, you, small bee, shall restore nature's power.

Gather and spread pollen amongst guardian flowers before chaos reaches you !

Hover tall grass to uncover flowers

Press SPACE near a flower to pick up pollen

Once you carry pollen, press SPACE near a matching flower to pollinate it
